name: doomsayer
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who says bad things are going to happen: Despite the doomsayers, the Athenians delivered the Olympic Games when they said they would. "I hate to be a doomsayer," he said, "but it's going to be hard to attract new business."
More examplesFewer examplesThe doomsayers think Indian industry will be wiped out.Unlike some doomsayers, he has done plenty of homework.Back then, people like him were considered doomsayers, a chorus of bleak voices prophesying a strange war to come.
